alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 10:57PM MST until November 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SATURDAY TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches, with 6 to 12 inches expected above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 AM MST Saturday. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM Saturday to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
